sentences.sContent: The train service is not very good.
My French is better than my Spanish.
sentences.sCn: 我的法语比西班牙语好。

sentences.sContent: Alex is very good at languages.
sentences.sCn: 亚历克斯在语言方面很擅长。
她是一名非常优秀的球员。

sentences.sContent: ...He had always had a good memory...
...He knew my love for yoga and had seen a space close to where he lived that he thought might be good to serve as a yoga studio...
...A decorated egg thrown into the field would be a wish for a good harvest...
...which is still in good condition so far without any mechanical breakdowns or potential problems due to my careful maintenance...
...So it might be a good idea to get someone else to drive you home after that marathon...
...I had a really good stay here...
...patients can make allowance for them friendly for their good relationship...
...compare those excellent letters with a merely good letter: the candidate was productive...
...visiting a bookshop as curiosity leads us can be a good way to entertain ourselves...

synos.tran: 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的

phrases.pCn: 有效的；会产生；有支付…能力的
良好品质，高品质；好质量
和…几乎一样，实际上等于…
好运；幸运的事情；干的不错

words.tran: 感伤的；伪善的；假正经的
漂亮的；优秀的；相当多的
糖果；身份低微之老妇；吸引人的东西；伪君子

trans.tranOther: of a high standard or quality
